scripts.supabase:restart: npx supabase stop && npx supabase start && docker restart supabase_auth_DocGather && npm run supabase:serve
scripts.supabase:start: npx supabase start && docker restart supabase_auth_DocGather && npm run supabase:serve
scripts.supabase:reset: npx -y tsx supabase/seed.ts && npx supabase db reset && npm run database-types
scripts.test:rls: docker cp supabase/tests/rls_policies.test.sql supabase_db_DocGather:/tmp/rls_test.sql && docker exec supabase_db_DocGather sed -i "s/\r$//" /tmp/rls_test.sql && docker exec supabase_db_DocGather psql -U postgres -d postgres -f /tmp/rls_test.sql
